input: (isFocused) => ({        flex: '1 0 0',        width: '100%',        padding: '0.75rem 1rem',        background: isFocused ? 'transparent' : 'var(--Medium-Gray, #414141)',        borderRadius: '1rem',        border: isFocused ? 'transparent' : 'none',        outline: isFocused ? '2px solid var(--White, #FFF)' : 'none',        fontFamily: 'Inter',        fontSize: '16px',        fontWeight: '700',        color: 'var(--Neutral-gray-400, #FFFFFF)',        '::placeholder': { color: '#929292' },    })
